topic.title: Projects
topic.p: Projects let you combine Qodana reports within an organization and a team.
For %product%, each project is uniquely identified by a project token. This token lets you upload %product% reports to a specific project.

chapter.title: Create a project
chapter.p: On a team page, click the Create project button.

chapter.title: Manage a project
chapter.p: After the project was created, click Generate token to generate a unique project token for it. Using this token, %product% can upload reports as described in the section.
Once the token is generated, you can regenerate it, rename the project, or delete the project.
